Name: The Walking Dead: Episode 4: Around Every Corner
Overview: The episodic experts at Telltale Games return, this time putting players in the middle of a zombie apocalypse based on the popular comic and television show The Walking Dead. This series differs from many other episodic games, in that players have a limited amount of time to make their decisions, and their choices have permanent, lasting effects. In Episode 4 -- "Around Every Corner," the group continues its trek toward water, stumbles across a building that was home to disturbing experiments, and gets taunted by a mysterious voice over the radio, all while battling walkers.
